RelatedSentence: CHICAGO ( REUTERS ) - An Illinois man who had tested positive for antibodies to the Middle East Respiratory Syndrome virus in his blood is no longer infectious , state health officials said on Monday .
The two prior cases earlier in the month were both imported cases of Mers , brought to the United States by infected travelers from the Middle East , the epicenter of the Mers outbreak .
Florida officials separately said the second patient infected with Mers has now been released from the hospital in Orlando .
